sources.name: INAzureTableCustomers
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  INAzureTableCustomers

sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  INAzureTableOrders
